Thoughts.thought: The world's most sensible person and the biggest idiot both stay within us. The worst part is, you can't even tell who is who.
Thoughts.author: Chetan Bhagat

Thoughts.thought: Money is the one thing which rarely unites abd divides the people
Thoughts.author: Sudha Murthy

Thoughts.thought: Patience is the real truth of life heading toward success
Thoughts.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Thoughts.thought: I have been struck again and again by how important measurement is to improving the human condition.
Thoughts.author: Bill Gates

Thoughts.thought: I choose a lazy person to do a hard job. Because a lazy person will find an easy way to do it.
Thoughts.author: Jawaharlal Nehru
